name: org.eframework.u3d.msv
description: EFramework Modulize for Unity 是一个模块化开发框架，提供了 Module/Scene + View 架构的标准实现，支持模块管理、场景切换、视图控制等核心功能。

scripts.gen-meta:
find ./Docs -type f ! -name '*.meta' -exec sh -c 'for f; do [ -f "$f.meta" ] || { guid=$(openssl rand -hex 16); printf "fileFormatVersion: 2
guid: $guid
" > "$f.meta"; }; done' _ {} + && for f in Assets Docs CHANGELOG.md LICENSE.md package.json README.md; do [ -f "$f.meta" ] || { guid=$(openssl rand -hex 16); printf "fileFormatVersion: 2
guid: $guid
" > "$f.meta"; }; done
scripts.clean-meta: find ./Docs -name '*.meta' -delete && rm -f Assets.meta Docs.meta CHANGELOG.md.meta LICENSE.md.meta package.json.meta README.md.meta
